other_tests.findings: Prolonged F responses in both feet, normal motor and sensory responses in the distal segments of the arms, and no motor responses in the intrinsic foot muscles.
other_tests.changes_over_time: EMG and nerve-conduction studies showed decreased sensory responses, absent sural-nerve responses, prolonged F-wave latencies, and more prominent denervation in the tibialis anterior and medial gastrocnemius muscles compared to the previous study.

other_tests.findings: 2 liters of ascitic fluid were removed, and abdominal discomfort decreased.
other_tests.changes_over_time: During the next week, multiple therapeutic paracenteses were performed; no malignant cells were seen.

other_tests.procedure_name: Biopsy of left retroperitoneal lymph node
other_tests.findings: Pathological examination showed reactive hyperplasia; no malignant cells were identified.
Evidence of chronic demyelination and remyelination, with axonal degeneration affecting both myelinated and unmyelinated fibers.
Sheets of mature-appearing plasma cells showing lambda light-chain restriction.
